root: ^You notice a small, makeshift shop with the logo of the Emporium proudly on display.

merchant: ^"Ah, our noble saviour returns. Have a look at Julius' wares my friend - only the best prices, as always."
nomerchant: ^The merchant looks at you with a sneer, adjusting the large, purple hat that seems more than a little ruffled since your last encounter.
^"We have NOTHING to say to you... you - ruffian! Leave us at once before we call the Consul!"
^Only a empty stall fills the quiet corner of the market square.
